sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: Displays a previously hidden sprite. Sprite.Show has no effect if the sprite is already visible.
sections.text_content: Displays a previously hidden sprite. Sprite.Show has no effect if the sprite is already visible.
sections.mdown_content: Displays a previously hidden sprite. **Sprite.Show** has no effect if the sprite is already visible.

sections.title: Example
sections.text_content: See Sprite.Hide for an example of Sprite.Show.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling Sprite.Show, not by calling Show.
sections.text_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling Sprite.Show, not by calling Show.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling **Sprite.Show**, not by calling **Show**.
